about_the_game:
Welcome to BoundWorlds, a world-building action-RPG where your creativity knows no bounds! Immerse yourself in a realm of endless possibilities as you craft your own worlds, stories, and adventures. Whether you aim to create a simple dungeon level or a narrative-driven adventure, with our powerful and expansive level editor, you have the tools to transform your ideas into reality.

Explore the cosmos of BoundWorlds through a vast network of gates that connect player-created worlds. Experience the unique realms crafted by your fellow adventurers and seamlessly journey between these diverse worlds, forging a single cohesive experience.

Features


  • Design and build your own worlds with our intuitive and powerful level editor
  • Customize everything, from graphics and sounds to NPCs, enemies, and objects
  • Create immersive, story-driven experiences with cutscenes and interactive dialogue
  • Develop custom combat abilities, items, and magic to shape your world's gameplay
  • Use a drag-and-drop interface to script and reprogram the behavior of in-game entities
  • Connect your world to others, allowing players to explore and interact with your creations
  • Export custom objects for other players to use, fostering a thriving community of builders
  • Share your worlds and discover a universe of boundless creativity, all in one action-packed RPG

Dive into BoundWorlds and unleash your creative potential. Join a vibrant community of world-builders and embark on an unforgettable journey across the interconnected realms of this limitless universe. Download BoundWorlds today and begin your adventure in a world that is truly your own.

content_descriptors.notes:
Since BoundWorlds is heavily centered around user-created content, which may include uploaded images and sounds, it is not possible to perfectly control all content that appears in-game.

World editors can flag their own creations for mature content, and players can adjust according to their own standards, to keep them from entering worlds that may contain mature content. There is also a reporting system to punish content creators who do not flag their mature content appropriately.

BoundWorlds uses simple pixel graphics and is not expected to include realistic graphic imagery by content creators acting in good faith.

BoundWorlds is optimized for telling stories and it is probable that some stories may include text-based mature content or social themes.
